IX.iii.1.H.3.k
.
Retroactive Increases
Apply the principles in this topic even if the beneficiary subsequently establishes entitlement to a retroactive increase because of a reduction in countable income.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section H - Adjustments Based on Changes in Status
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section H
